title: Recognizing Dean Lancaster

sentence: Located in Lancaster County, Pennsylvania, the Manheim Lions Club is  a dedicated community partner, exemplifying the Lions International  motto of ``We Serve'' since their chartering in 1925.
title: Recognizing 100 Years of the Manheim Lions Club

sentence: During their stellar 20-2-3 season, the girls' soccer team won the  Lancaster-Lebanon League section title and advanced to the District  Three 3A championship.
title: Congratulating Coach Dan Hogan and Coach Lynn Parmer on Coaching Honors

sentence: He also oversaw the expansion of VisionCorps from one  facility in Lancaster to rehabilitation and employment sites in Adams,  Chester, Lebanon, and York Counties, as well as in Little Rock,  Arkansas.
title: Congratulating Visioncorps President and Ceo Dennis Steiner on His Retirement

sentence: Their doubles team was instrumental in Hempfield's 15- win start and claiming the Section One title, second place finish in  the Lancaster-Lebanon League, and fourth place finish in the district  3A team tournaments.
title: Congratulating Cooper Lehman and Braylen Garcia, Tennis Doubles Champions

sentence: What began as a poultry auction one century ago has become a staple  of Lancaster County's heritage.
title: Recognizing and Thanking Joanne Horn

sentence: Speaker, today I rise to honor the remarkable  life and service of Richard ``Dick'' Young, a lifelong member of the  Lancaster, New York community, who recently passed away at the age of  94.
title: Recognizing the Life of Service of Dick Young

sentence: is a  steel fabricator and installer based in Lancaster, Pennsylvania.
title: Congratulating Goodhart Sons Inc. on Their 90th Anniversary

sentence: What was formerly known as the York County YMCA merged with the  Lancaster County YMCA in 2021 to become YMCA of the Roses.
title: Congratulating Ymca of the Roses Ceo and President Larry Richardson on His Retirement

sentence: Beth Haldeman's history with Cocalico School District, located in  northern Lancaster County, began in 2000 as the reading specialist and  principal at the former Schoeneck Elementary School.
title: Congratulating Dr. Beth Haldeman on Her Retirement

sentence: Albright, a rising senior at Hempfield High School in Lancaster  County, was also the Division Champion at the 2025 North Museum Science  and Engineering Fair.
title: Recognizing Mr. Ethan Albright for His Achievement in Local and International Science Fair

sentence: Chase Muchmore is a current student at Manor Middle School and is a  Corporal with the Young Marines of Lancaster County.
title: Recognizing Young Marine Corporal Chase Muchmore on Being Named the Pennsylvania Regiment Junior Young Marine of the Year

sentence: Speaker, I am pleased to recognize and congratulate  Chief Richard Mendez on his retirement as Chief of the Lancaster City  Bureau of Police Chief, and I thank him for his 25 years of dedicated  service to the Lancaster community.
title: Congratulating Lancaster City Police Chief Richard Mendez on His Retirement

sentence: Speaker, I am pleased to congratulate and recognize  the Penn Manor Future Farmers of America chapter (Manor FFA),  affiliated with Penn Manor High School in Lancaster County,  Pennsylvania, on their accomplishments at the 98th National FFA  Convention & Expo.
title: Congratulating the Manor Future Farmers of America

sentence: Leon Ressler on his retirement after 37 years with Penn State Extension  in Lancaster County.
